text:
Hi Jane. It’s no trouble at all. I’m here to help. Sometimes it’s the small questions that are the most important. Glad you got your applications off. :crossed_fingers: 
When should you hear? 
Good luck with your exams. 
It can be a stressful time. just remember you can only do your best :slightly_smiling_face:
I’m here if you ever want a chat. I’m not too busy for you.
